body.name: Mothca Matte Glass Screen Protector for iPhone 14 / iPhone 13 / iPhone 13 Pro [6.1 Inch] Anti-Glare & Anti-Fingerprint Tempered Glass, Smooth as Silk
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 17 hrs 1 min
features: 【HD Clear】[ATTENTION: NOT COMPATIBLE FOR iPhone 14 Pro] Screen Protector Compatible with iPhone 14/ 13/ 13 Pro - 6.1 inch smartphone. Tempered Glass with 9H screen hardness, Mothca matte screen protector is matte finish but also HD clear. While some poor quality matte glass has poor clarity and transparency, we promise you never need to worry about the same problem for Mothca Matte Glass.

【Smooth as Silk】The perfect matte surface has the silk-like touch feeling, magically resists dirt, sweat and annoying fingerprints, very little frictional resistance even for hand sweating. Easy to flick operation, "Comfortable Game Operation". 100% touch accurate.
【Anti-Glare】The matte finish tempered glass using the same technology as E-reader matte screen, no screen glare, even in bright sunlight, no dazzling, easy reading outdoor or under light.

【Go Further Than 2.5D Round Edge】A special polishing is crafted to edge of the glass to give a more smooth touch feeling, go further than 2.5D round edge, not easy to be broken and extremely durable. 9H hardness, protect your iPhone 14/ 13/ 13 Pro screen from scratches, daily wear and drops.

【Easy to Install】Mothca screen protector comes with precise installation alignment frame that make installation quick and easy, even for beginners. Please watch the video tutorial before installing if you don’t know how to get started.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mothca Matte Screen Protector for iPhone 14 / 13 / 13 Pro 6.1-inch CASE FRIENDLY: Mothca iPhone 14 / 13 /13 Pro Matte screen protector will allow you to use almost all kinds of case. DAILY PROTECTION: Designed with a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating and an anti-scratch surface to protect your screen from accidental spills, oil residue from fingerprints, bumps and daily wear-and-tear. Package included: 1 x Matte Tempered Glass Screen Protector for iPhone 14 / 13 / 13 Pro 6.1-inch1 x Cleaning Set1 x Alignment Sticker1 x Retail Packaging

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the antireflective coating!
reviews.reviewText: I break screen protectors often because I drop my phone a lot. This time around I decided to try an antireflective protector because I use my phone outside much of the time. Fortunately, I've never broken my phone glass.This glass is perfectly cut for my phone and comes with a temporary snap-on guide to help you place the glass in perfect alignment with the sides of the phone. It's the first time I've seen this feature and I love it. I also love the texture of the glass, it has a very appealing soft feel that looks great too. It cost a little more but between the high quality coating and the plastic guide, it's worth a few bucks more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing feel and quality
reviews.reviewText: “I recently purchased this matte anti-glare tempered glass for my iPhone 13 Pro, and I’m pleasantly surprised by its appearance, clarity, and overall quality. The matte finish not only provides a unique touch but also minimizes glare effectively. The tempered glass construction enhances its durability, ensuring long-lasting protection for my screen. While I appreciate the innovative matte design, I wish the package included an installation placer, similar to other sellers. Nevertheless, the impressive appearance, crystal-clear clarity, and top-notch quality make this tempered glass a valuable addition to my device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome feeling screen protector!
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome product for anyone looking to replace a screen protector. Coming from a matte plastic screen protector on my work tablet, I was looking for something similar for my iphone, and the fact that this delivers the same matte feel and look while being tempered glass is so good. Clarity is not affected to be honest, but the feel you get in your fingers is top notch, gliding feels super smooth, and fingerprints don’t show, unless you have greasy fingers. Glare is reduced as well, making it easier on my eyes. We’ll see about durability, but so far so good.Installation was super easy with the included guide, dust stickers and wipes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great, but shatters quite easily.
reviews.reviewText: i love this screen protector, especially due to its innate anti-glare and the feeling. the only downside is that it shatters and easily breaks into small pieces. even when dropping from a low height, it always seems to crack, while other screen protectors won't. you have to be a bit more careful i guess. 🤷

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bright overhead lights at work and this screen protector gets rid of it completely! Quickest and easiest installation, no bubbles. I use it on an iPhone 14

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product and even better customer service
reviews.reviewText: So firstly, i messed up putting the screen protector on and dropped it and got dirt under the screen in the process. I reached out to the customer service people and they sent me another one. Amazing customer service! So helpful.Ok now about the screen protector! It’s epic. Reduces glare, robust, super silky feeling when using my phone now. It’s like a million percent upgrade from my prior screen.Lessons learned from install. Clean per the instructions. Put the plastic mount thing on the phone, then put the glass down onto using the plastic thing as a guide. Don’t do as I did and use the plastic thing as a holder for the glass as it doesn’t work like that.A* product and even better customer support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Screen guard in matte
reviews.reviewText: Nice screen guard. I like that isn’t shiny. The matte look is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best screen protector I’ve used…with a few quirks.
reviews.reviewText: I don’t write reviews often, but I was thinking about how much I enjoyed using this screen protector that I just had to write one. I wanna start off by saying ITS NOT FOR EVERYONE! You’ll either love it or hate it. I love the feel I get when I type or scroll, it’s refreshing to have some sort of feedback instead of just glass. I also love reading on my phone now, it feels more like a kindle in a way. The protector also does a good job with the anti glare.However, there are a few trade offs you’ll have to accept to enjoy it. If you use your phone with a high brightness level, you might notice the loss in resolution more and notice things like a rainbow effect. This is especially noticeable on white colors, they look as if the screen were greasy and show pixels. I’ve gotten used to it and have my phone on dark mode, low brightness, so it’s not as noticeable. I’ve only had it for a few weeks, and it still looks brand new. I expect with time, the finish may wear off or scratch, but only time will tell. Also they don’t include a installation tray to get the protector perfectly on the screen.

reviews.reviewerName: Happy I didn’t listen to negative reviews.
reviews.reviewText: I thought I’d never be able to apply this properly but it includes everything you need. Two placement stickers made placement super easy. Love the matte finish because it doesn’t hurt my eyes when I’m reading on my phone. Would highly recommend!
Ottima pellicola e facile anche il montaggio, la consiglio

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good product, for an iPhone 13 Pro. The anti glare properties are amazing and has a great feel to touch. I understand it is a bit pricy but 100% worth it. The installation was effortless : just make sure to keep whichever place you install it in, clean. The appearance looks seamless and fully covers the phone. So far I have not had any issues with the durability issues, however if anything happens I will add it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product, saved my screen more than once . Like the Matt
